title: File a Campaign Finance Report
description: The treasurer for a political campaign is filing a quarterly campaign finance disclosure report.

tasks.description: Identify the political committee and the correct reporting period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The treasurer selects their committee and the correct quarter.

tasks.description: Input all contributions and expenditures for the period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The treasurer accurately enters all financial data into the online form.

tasks.description: Submit the report to the state ethics commission.
tasks.expected_outcome: The treasurer successfully files the report by the deadline.
